channel.title: Comments on: Build a PowerApp – Data from Nav 2017 Part1

item.title: By: Anil Kumar Anisetty
item.dc:creator: Anil Kumar Anisetty
item.description:
Hello Jasprit,
I am not able to make dynamics nav connection it says below. I have given the right url because when i open the same in browser it works. Please see if you can help me on this.
The URL '' is not a valid Microsoft Dynamics NAV OData feed URL. The OData feed URL can be found on the 'Web Services' page in Microsoft Dynamics NAV. clientRequestId: 97dd8e54-4ebc-4109-b0c2-9b66c8bc91c2
item.content:encoded:
Hello Jasprit,

I am not able to make dynamics nav connection it says below. I have given the right url because when i open the same in browser it works. Please see if you can help me on this.

The URL ” is not a valid Microsoft Dynamics NAV OData feed URL. The OData feed URL can be found on the ‘Web Services’ page in Microsoft Dynamics NAV. clientRequestId: 97dd8e54-4ebc-4109-b0c2-9b66c8bc91c2
